comment.author: 33757347@N00
comment._content: It's Sivlefossen, actually, not Silve-, like the Norwegian poet Per Sivle (1857-1904) - raised at the farm just above this waterfall.

comment.author: 34405198@N02
comment._content: A little more about the scenery. Per Sivle was not born here but at Flaam where his mother came from, but his father was from this place and Sivle also grew up here living with relatives as his mother died early in his age. We are not in the area of Hardangerfjord, This place is a short drive from Gudvangen at Naeroyfjord, a branch of Sognefjorden.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thank you for this information! We will correct the source data and reload the description.
